item.title: 情報筋パトリック・スンシオンがロサンゼルス・タイムズ紙をペンスキー・メディアCEOのジェイ・ペンスキーに売却交渉中。
item.description:
Joe Bel Bruno / The Intersect:
Sources: Patrick Soon-Shiong is in talks to sell the Los Angeles Times to Penske Media CEO Jay Penske, a week after Soon-Shiong sold the San Diego Union-Tribune  —  Any deal, which is not guaranteed as these talks are described as early, would transform Penske into a Los Angeles publishing mogul.

item.title: 分析：米国の週刊ポッドキャストリスナーの53％が米国以外のポッドキャストを聴いている。2023年2月、ポッドキャストリスナーが最も急増したのはラテンアメリカで、前年比7.7％増（Sara Guaglione/Digiday）
item.description:
Sara Guaglione / Digiday:
Analyses: 53% of weekly US podcast listeners listen to non-US podcasts; in February 2023, Latin America saw the fastest growth in podcast listeners, up 7.7% YoY  —  Though the podcast industry is in a state of correction after a period of significant investment, some podcast networks have found …

item.title: ロシアのネット検閲がプリゴジンのウェブサイトを禁止した後、宙ぶらりんの状態にあるロシアの軍閥エフゲニー・プリゴジンのオンライン・メディア帝国を見てみよう（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
A look at Russian warlord Yevgeny Prigozhin's online media empire, which stands in post-mutiny limbo after Russia's internet censor banned Prigozhin websites  —  Vladimir Putin has blocked access to mutinous warlord's websites but his troll accounts remain active

item.title: DVD、ストリーミングに続き、Netflixは第3の、そして最も野心的な行為と思われるビデオゲームに向けて準備を進めている。
item.description:
Lewis Gordon / The Ringer:
After DVDs and streaming, Netflix gears up for what appears to be its third and most ambitious act: video games, with 67 in its library and 86 in development  —  First came DVDs.  Then came streaming movies and TV.  Now, Netflix is betting big on video games—and new release 'Oxenfree II …

item.title: 書簡：映画芸術科学アカデミーは、2022年7月以降に少なくとも4人の黒人指導者が退いた後、DEIプログラムへのコミットメントを確認する（Clayton Davis/Variety）
item.description:
Clayton Davis / Variety:
Letter: the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences affirms its commitment to DEI programs after the exit of at least four Black leaders since July 2022  —  The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences sent a letter to its members on Friday evening, addressing the recent departure …

item.title: 情報筋はSAG-AFTRAの要求について、ストリーミング収入の2％をパフォーマーに支払うこと、AIに肖像を使用する際の補償、賃上げなどを詳しく説明している（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
Sources detail some of SAG-AFTRA's demands, including paying 2% of streaming revenue to performers, compensation when using likenesses for AI, pay raises, more  —  According to sources on both sides, the biggest sticking point is the union's demand for 2% of the revenue generated by streaming shows.

item.title: 有料会員1,100万人を含む登録会員数1億人を超えるソニー傘下のアニメストリーミングサービス「クランチロール」。
item.description:
Sohee Kim / Bloomberg:
A look at Sony-owned Crunchyroll, which has 100M+ registered members, including 11M paid subscribers, as the anime streaming service looks to India for growth  —  - President says new anime markets like India will drive growth  — Global expansion helps owner Sony boost entertainment content

item.title: イーロン・マスクによると、広告収入が50％減少し、負債が重くなったため、ツイッターのキャッシュフローはマイナスになったが、2023年3月には第2四半期にキャッシュフローがプラスになる可能性があると述べた（Jahnavi Nidumolu/Reuters）
item.description:
Jahnavi Nidumolu / Reuters:
Elon Musk says a ~50% ad revenue drop and a heavy debt load kept Twitter cash flow negative; he said in March 2023 the company could be cash flow positive in Q2  —  Elon Musk said Twitter's cash flow remains negative because of a nearly 50% drop in advertising revenue and a heavy debt load.

item.title: 研究結果ChatGPTにより、ライターはプレスリリースや報告書の作成などのタスクを40％速く完了し、評価者が18％高い品質を評価する作品を作成することができた（Rhiannon Williams/MIT Technology Review）。
item.description:
Rhiannon Williams / MIT Technology Review:
Study: ChatGPT helped writers complete tasks, such as writing press releases or reports, 40% faster and produce work that assessors scored 18% higher in quality  —  People who use ChatGPT to help with writing tasks are more productive and produce higher-quality work than those who don't, a study found.

item.title: 情報源：ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙のスタッフは全員参加の会議で、スポーツデスクの削減方法に不満を表明し、アスレチック紙の基準の違いに懸念を表明した（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
Sources: at an all-hands, New York Times staff expressed frustration at how the sports desk was cut and raised concerns over differing standards at The Athletic  —  A routine all-company meeting turned tense as New York Times employees pressed management on its decision to disband …

item.title: ラジオと音楽業界の業界サイト「オール・アクセス」が、「前進することが不可能になる」収益減少を理由に、28年後の2023年8月15日に閉鎖予定（Jessica Nicholson/Billboard）
item.description:
Jessica Nicholson / Billboard:
Radio and music industry trade website All Access plans to close on August 15, 2023, after 28 years, over a revenue drop “that makes moving forward impossible”  —  “We will all miss serving and working with all of you — our readers and clients," said founder/president/publisher Joel Denver in a statement.

item.title: 2022年創業のクリエイター収益化プラットフォームPassesが、2020年創業のライバルFanhouseの買収を計画。
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Creator monetization platform Passes, founded in 2022, plans to acquire rival Fanhouse, founded in 2020; some creators are worried and one Fanhouse founder quit  —  The creator monetization platform Fanhouse announced yesterday that it was acquired by Passes, a similar startup that only launched in beta in December.

item.title: ルーシー・グオ、ファンハウス買収にパス（Kaya Yurieff/The Information）
item.description:
Kaya Yurieff / The Information:
Lucy Guo's Passes to Buy Fanhouse  —  A startup that rode the pandemic-era frenzy around OnlyFans is selling to a rival.  Fanhouse, which operates a website where creators charge fans for exclusive content, has agreed to sell itself to Passes, a Miami-based membership service for creators …

item.title: 2023年4月に発表されたフェニックス・サンズとグレイ・テレビジョンの放送契約が正式決定、報道：ダイヤモンドスポーツのRSNはグレイのオファーに及ばず（David Satin/The Streamable）
item.description:
David Satin / The Streamable:
The Phoenix Suns and Gray Television's broadcasting deal, announced in April 2023, becomes official; report: Diamond Sports' RSN could not match Gray's offer  —  Bally Sports Arizona may not have any teams' games left to broadcast by the end of business on Monday.

item.title: 欧州議会は、YouTubeが第三者のウェブサイト上の広告に関する独自のルールを破ったとの調査結果を受け、2020年から現在までのYouTube広告を監査している（Lara O'Reilly/Insider）
item.description:
Lara O'Reilly / Insider:
The European Parliament is auditing its YouTube advertising from 2020 to date, after a study alleged YouTube broke its own rules for ads on third-party websites  —  - The European Parliament said it's auditing its YouTube advertising from 2020 to date.  — It follows a study …
